Class Controller

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
Controller
public class Controller
extends javafx.application.Application
The controller part of the MVC model

    • release

      public void release​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event, java.lang.String name, boolean startingInTile)
      Controls the release event. When drag starts in tilepane adds a new imageView of the same plant to the center pane. Also checks for collisions among ImageViews according to spread.
      Parameters:
      event - the mouse event
      name - the name or key of the plant being released
      startingInTile - boolean to inform if drag started in tile pane

    • iteratePlot

      public void iteratePlot​(java.util.ListIterator<Vector2> itr, java.util.ArrayList<Vector2> list, boolean isPolygon)
      Scales and translates all the points onto the screen by calling drawLine in View
      Parameters:
      Iterator - itr
      ArrayList - representing which plot boundary list, outline or polygonCorners
      boolean - isPolygon representing if the boundary is a polygon
      double - scale

    • settingLength

      public void settingLength​(double length)
      Called after user hits enter after inputting the dimension of their line, in feet. Sets the length per pixel in model by dividing user inputted value by the number of pixels in the line
      Parameters:
      double - representing the user inputted line dimension
